search_result.link_content_summary:
{
 "Summary": "Cargrill and Continental Grain Company will acquire Sanderson Farms for $203 per share in cash. The transaction forms a new joint-owned private poultry business. The new entity will combine the best-in-class operators, Wayne Farms and Sanderson Farms, under Cargill and Continental Grain’s joint ownership. The transaction has acquired the necessary funding and will likely close in late 2021 or early 2022, pending regulatory approval and Sanderson Farms stockholder approval.",
 "Company Name": "Cargill",
 "Email": "[email protected]",

 "Address": "None",
 "Product Information": "Carried poultry and foodservice offerings",
 "Representative": "Clint Rivers",
 "Useful Information": "Cargill has a long-standing relationship and investment history with American farmers. The company is committed to the strengthening of food and agriculture industries for the benefit of growers and consumers."
}
